title: All Ball - Team USA Gold Medal Recap and Pt. 2 with Maurice Clarett on Ohio State Ending, NFL Regrets, Public Downfall, Prison Transformation
itunes:title: All Ball - Team USA Gold Medal Recap and Pt. 2 with Maurice Clarett on Ohio State Ending, NFL Regrets, Public Downfall, Prison Transformation
description:
In this episode, Doug recaps the best and worst from Team USA's gold medal run, and sits down for part two of his interview with former Ohio State standout running back and national champion Maurice Clarett, who explains why he ultimately decided to leave Ohio State instead of continue to fight for eligibility, what it was like taking on the NFL to enter the draft as a 19-year old, inside his disastrous combine, what went wrong with the Broncos, what really happened with his public arrest for robbery, and how he transformed his life while in prison. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
